snippet: “Cubism: The Leonard A. Lauder Collection” at the Metropolitan Museum of Art showcases Picasso, Braque, Gris and Léger and one man’s generosity.
abstract: Roberta Smith reviews exhibit Cubism: The Leonard A Lauder Collection at the Metropolitan Museum of Art.
lead_paragraph: “Cubism: The Leonard A. Lauder Collection” at the Metropolitan Museum of Art showcases Picasso, Braque, Gris and Léger and one man’s generosity.

headline.seo: ‘Cubism: The Leonard A. Lauder Collection,’ Starring Picasso and Braque
headline.main: It Was Hip to Be Square
